title: Post Mortem on Cloudflare Control Plane and Analytics Outage
dot:
digraph CloudflareOutage{node[shape=box, style=rounded];Incident[label="Incident Overview
November 2-4, 2023
Outage of Control Plane & Analytics"]; Timeline[label="Timeline
- Outage Start: Nov 2, 11:43 UTC
- Recovery Start: Nov 2, 17:57 UTC
- Full Restoration: Nov 4, 04:25 UTC"];Causes[label="Causes
- Power failure at PDX-DC04
- Ground fault on transformer
- UPS batteries failed
- Delayed response from Flexential"];Design[label="Intended Design
- High Availability across 3 Data Centers
- Redundant power and network connections
- Data syncing between clusters"];Failures[label="Failures
- Critical systems had non-obvious dependencies
- Logging systems not part of high availability
- Newer products not onboarded to high availability"];Recovery[label="Recovery Steps
- Failed over to Disaster Recovery sites
- Gradual power restoration
- Rate limiting to manage API calls"];Lessons[label="Lessons Learned
- Need for Code Orange process
- Remove core dependencies
- Improve disaster recovery testing
- Regular audits of data centers"];Incident->Timeline;Incident->Causes;Incident->Design;Causes->Failures;Failures->Recovery;Recovery->Lessons;}
